Halloumi_environment_property.description: An Halloumi property using a value from your .env.* files

Halloumi_template_property.description: An Halloumi property using a template to load it's value

body: r.parameter { ... } # to be able to +Ref+ the value of a CloudFormation template parameter
r.ref { ... } # to be able to imitate referencing a resource
r.property { ... } # to define properties on the virtual resource
